pullrequest.title: fixed the zipping issue, and added to the integration test

content.raw: Interesting.  We should definitely figure out why the test sometimes fails (there are probably multiple conditions, including [unexpected security group creation errors](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/cloudsim/job/cloudsim-default-devel-precise-amd64/151/testReport/junit/%28root%29/RestTest/test/).  But that doesn't have to happen as part of this pull request.
content.html: Interesting. We should definitely figure out why the test sometimes fails (there are probably multiple conditions, including unexpected security group creation errors. But that doesn't have to happen as part of this pull request.
